its too bad she wont live but then again who does

you know its a good game when you start recalling it as a vivid memory not you standard pointandclick adventure game while it controls like one its mostly sort of a litelifesim with a lot of internal clocks for event triggers you may or may not run into some character because you were at the right place at the right time   good game moody great canon writing great voice acting and faithful to its source material

i would gave the game a recommendation if it wasnt for a gamebreaking bug in act 4  cant progress the game any further because of police spawning and killing me while i am stuck in a cutscene otherwise it ran fine had some minor issues like graphical bugs or items popup going too fast

you could tell the developers were extremely optimistic on how much they wanted to do with this  a clue system with filterable tabs for types of clues a money system tons of different areas etc  none of it was put to good use at all  the only reason you might play this game for awhile is that it takes forever to get anywhere  environments are empty and the story is almost a straight rip off the film

very good adventure game captures the feeling of blade runner perfectly and has interesting story has replayability because lots of the game has randomness and decisions effect the future events fantastic if would have been playing this back in the day
story was great although i had to check a walkthrough once or twice to get my bearings but usually spoils one thing or another no matter how hard you try to avoid it
really good but play the classic edition
this is a game its not the game it is just a game this review will self destruct in 8 years

a game based on my favourite movie of all time  instant 1010
classic scifi noir point and click adventure

what a 90s gem from westwood studios everything a blade runner fan could ask for in a movie tiein game if you dig in youll find that this game goes surprisingly deep the enhanced edition itself wasnt very well done in my opinion i recommend playing the classic edition instead which you get for free when you buy the game
great game

great game but please play it classic with restored content the enhanced edition looks nice but trims out so much content that helps to worldbuild and give life to the characters especially mccoy himself i assume this is to streamline the experience which might be jarring to people new to this type of game who may find it frustrating but it is not worth the graphical clean up
still a great game after all these years
i am deeply in love with officer mccoy
if youre looking for an experience true to the first movie play this
awesome game and really capture the nostalgia

this is one of my top three favorite point  click games ever i love the cyberpunk atmosphere with the fmv  the only con i have for this game is that i almost got every achievement not including the difficultyrelated ones under 5 hours

finished this game about 7 times in my life maybe the best point n click ever made i was pleasantly surprised the old graphics were an option because with the remade graphics i really dont know what hell they were thinking

good game classic game the photo puzzles was not fun if you dont select the option player choice you will have to keep clicking until all dialogue is selected automatically based on your personality it also has a rng element on the possible events in a playthrough why it merits replayability you are still going through most of the motions
the game has bugs butit is very full of blade runner vibes  i enjoyed the point and click interface and solving puzzles as the cases advanced  very immersive

this is a very special game and altho this is definately not a real remaster its amazing to able to play this on modern systems without too much hassle  if youre a blade runner or cyberpunk fan this is a must play

i have never played the original but it is included in this copy there is no problems with upscaling and text readability with the enhanced edition but both are included all in all it is u great gameu one of those classic games where the solution isnt present to you and isnt obvious certainly cannot be enjoyed by anyone like most pointandclick adventure from the 90s but if you are fan of blade runner or classic 90s game pick this up when its on sale

all of the negative reviews for this game are just old men complaining that its a remaster while in the game there is literally a button you can press at any time that reverts the game to the original   the original is 27 years old a remaster is not automatically a bad thing

the enhanced edition is actual garbage theres noticeable latency when moving the mouse in the menus and the updated textures look awful however the original game is included and is worth playing its a very interesting take on the blade runner series and was clearly made by fans of the original movie i even noticed a few references to pkd novels via character  place names id recommend it to any scifi fan who can get past the past the quite dated gameplay

i will forever be seeking games that feel like this i played the enhanced version and toggled the old graphics a lot because of the image upscale making text difficult to read absolutely wonderful experience for someone new to point and click adventures

enhanced my ass basically a crappy rerelease

tentative recommendation the enhanced version is blurry and lacks the sharpness and detail of the original game however this game does come with the original and the original game with restored content you wont be able to get achievements but this is a very stable version of the original release as its just using the scummvm package

i cant believe this game came out in the 90s i started playing this game at the beginning of college which got really busy but the game has always sticked to my head and i was always planning when to return to it now its summer i got to experience the game once and for all the atmosphere the writing the design everything its perfect i definitely see myself coming back to this game knowing that it has multiple endings one of the best games ive ever played much love

there is nothing enhanced about this enhanced edition really nothing its just blurred luckily you can play with the original graphics if you choose which are actually superior in short this is one of the best adventure games of all time but this alleged enhancement of it is a scam even though you can play with the original graphics i recommend not rewarding the developers by buying this version buy the original version  if still available here or on gog  instead
